info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: Developer with high interest in functional programming and CI/CD. Keen to learn and share gained knowledge.

history.summary: Developer with a focus on a CI/CD in a Data Warehousing project for investment bank
highlights: Introduction of python as a main scripting language of project
Key role in migration from git to svn, and establishment of CI culture
Developed and integrated new approach of building database release artifact. 40 times reduction in artifact size, 5 times increase in build speed
Developed java integration service of DB and MQ
Everyday ETL work on a billion records database

history.summary: Started as a junior, grew to lead a tiny team of a Data Warehouse for document automation system
highlights: Data mart creation and optimization for optimal user experience

speaking.title: Functional Programming and SQL
speaking.summary: Exploring a bit of PL history, and similarities and differences between functional paradigm and SQL's select

speaking.title: Actor model 101
speaking.summary: Explaining idea of actors as a concurrency model

extracurricular.title: NYET IT Club
extracurricular.activity: Founded small club, to share my knowledge IT with friends in a form of a online meetups, with lectures and homework. All material prepared from scratch
highlights: Python and oop principles introduction course. This helped one of the members to acquire python developer position
